name: menshevik
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a supporter of a political group formed in Russia in 1903 when it broke away from Lenin and the Bolsheviks

belonging or relating to the Mensheviks: The Menshevik leadership of the early years was swept from office. The Menshevik Party was abolished by the communist authorities in the 1920s.
More examplesFewer examplesThe terms were used by the bourgeois and Menshevik press. She was the daughter of Menshevik revolutionaries.The Menshevik view was of no significance to him.
